articles.author: Muhammad Zulhusni
articles.title: Meta, Microsoft, X, and Match back Epic Games in Apple dispute - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: Epic Games and Apple continue their intense legal feud over App Store payment policies; but with Meta, Microsoft, X, and Match joining in.
articles.content:
• Epic Games, joined by Meta, Microsoft, X, and Match, intensifies its legal battle against Apple.
  • Recent legal developments see the Supreme Court rejecting appeals from both Apple and … [+5485 chars]
